Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'So your "help" was to call in the Gray Ravens?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'What else? Are you expecting the commandant to fight with bare hands?', 4: '2'}
{2: "I'm actually a pretty competent fighter...", 3: '12', 4: "Don't underestimate me...", 5: '13'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "There's no way I'll put you on the frontline! So stay back, and no more funny business! I'll take the front!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Underestimated or not, you get behind me right now!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "As long as you're in Oasis, I'll make sure of your safetyâ€”", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "It's obvious that you don't have enough manpower for this fight, Watanabe.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "This attack is different from the ones before... This is clearly planned, and they strike when we're still recouping our forces.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'That suddenly gets scarier.', 3: '25', 4: "Luckily you've got us.", 5: '26'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Did you think I was bluffing in the beginning?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Enough small talk. Now that you're here, help me take out the trash.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Alright, let's go!", 3: '28', 4: 'Gray Raven, on your mark!', 5: '28'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Hmph, are you hyping us up now?', 4: '1'}
